mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_TABLE P, MEMBER_TABLE M WHERE P.PROJECT_ID = M.PROJECT_ID AND M.USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_TABLE(PROJECT_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_RANK, USER_ID) VALUES(#{project_id}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_rank}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT P.PROJECT_NAME, P.PROJECT_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_RANK, USER_ID FROM PROJECT_TABLE P, MEMBER_TABLE M WHERE P.PROJECT_ID = M.PROJECT_ID AND M.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY P.PROJECT_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY_TABLE(CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PROJECT_ID) VALUES(CATEGORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{category_name}, #{project_id})
mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY_TABLE C, PROJECT_TABLE P WHERE C.PROJECT_ID = P.PROJECT_ID AND P.PROJECT_name = #{project_name} ORDER BY P.PROJECT_ID DESC
